short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and beautiful note-taking extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience with Sticky Notes 1.0, the ultimate productivity tool that allows you to jot down ideas, reminders, and important information directly on your browser! Whether you're a student, professional, or just someone who likes to stay organized, Sticky Notes makes it easy to keep track of your thoughts without the hassle of external applications.
With Sticky Notes 1.0, you can stay organized and boost your productivity without switching between multiple apps. Keep your important thoughts right where you need themâ€”on your browser! Perfect for brainstorming, to-do lists, or simply capturing fleeting ideas as they come to you.

Feel free to adjust any parts of this description to better match the features and style of your Sticky Notes extension!
